abstract: The maker of Flip video cameras was bought by Cisco Systems for $590 million, in a move that may help Cisco extend its videoconferencing technology to mobile devices.
snippet: The maker of Flip video cameras was bought by Cisco Systems for $590 million, in a move that may help Cisco extend its videoconferencing technology to mobile devices.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Calif.  Pure Digital Technologies thought small and simple, and it paid off big time.

headline.main: A Tiny Camcorder Has a Big Payday
headline.print_headline: A Tiny Camcorder Has a Big Payday
